The Yithians possess great size that they may use to crush or hit an investigator.

What is the preferred method of combat for the Yithians?
However, this civilized race avoids hand-to-hand combat, preferring weapons that fire great gouts of electricity—weapons that were originally created to destroy the flying polyps.
